home.title: Translation demo
home.description:
Create, participate and share your quizz with your friends
Everything is free just create an account.

modal.title: Connection
modal.description:
You can login or create an account via facebook or twitter and then complete your profile.
Know that we will never post without your permission!

quizz.noone: No one has participated in the quizz yet
quizz.noexist: This quizz does not exist or has been removed
quizz.open: This quizz is open to everyone
quizz.close: Only registered users can answer this quizz
quizz.firstanswer: You are the first to play this quizz
quizz.author: This quizz was created by
quizz.alreadyanswer: You have already participated in this quizz, your result :
quizz.successanswer: Bravo you're done, here's your result:
quizz.needconnection: You have to login to play
quizz.askdelete: Are you sure you want to delete your quizz ?
quizz.setprivate: Private quizz (Only accessible via the url)
quizz.setclose: Closed Quizz (Only registered users can answer)

error.emptyquestion: Check that no questions/answers are empty
error.onequestion: Your quizz must have at least one question
error.needtitle: You must give a title to your quizz

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
